name: eth_simulateV1
summary: Executes a sequence of message calls building on each other's state without creating transactions on the block chain, optionally overriding block and state data

blockStateCalls.title: Block State Calls
blockStateCalls.description: Definition of blocks that can contain calls and overrides

blockOverrides.title: Block overrides
blockOverrides.description:
Block overrides can be used to replace fields in a block.
default: no block override.

number.title: Number
number.description: When overriding block numbers across multiple blocks, block number need to be increasing. Skipping over blocks numbers is possible. If block number is not specified, it's incremented by one for each block.

prevRandao.title: The Previous value of randomness beacon

time.title: Time
time.description: Time must either increase or remain constant relative to the previous block. If time is not specified, it's incremented by one for each block.

baseFeePerGas.title: Base fee per unit of gas

withdrawals.title: Withdrawals made by validators
withdrawals.description: This array can have a maximum length of 16.

validatorIndex.title: index of validator that generated withdrawal

blobBaseFee.title: Base fee per unit of blob gas

stateOverrides.title: State overrides
stateOverrides.description:
State overrides can be used to replace existing blockchain state with new state.
Default: no state overrides

^0x[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$.title: Details of an account to be overridden

oneOf.title: Account override with whole storage replacement
oneOf.description: It is possible to override any kind of address (EOA's, contracts and precompiles)

movePrecompileToAddress.title: MovePrecompileToAddress
movePrecompileToAddress.description: Moves addresses precompile into the specified address. This move is done before the 'code' override is set. When the specified address is not a precompile, the behaviour is undefined and different clients might behave differently.

state.title: Storage
state.description: Key-value mapping to override all slots in the account storage before executing the call. This functions similar to eth_call's state parameter.

oneOf.title: Account override with partial storage modification

movePrecompileToAddress.title: MovePrecompileToAddress
movePrecompileToAddress.description: Moves addresses precompile into the specified address. This move is done before the 'code' override is set. Can only move precompiles.

stateDiff.title: Storage difference
stateDiff.description: Key-value mapping to override individual slots in the account storage before executing the call. This functions similar to eth_call's state parameter.

calls.title: calls
calls.description:
List of transactions to execute at this block/state.
Default: []

gas.title: gas limit
gas.description: Default: Remaining gas in the current block

gasPrice.title: gas price
gasPrice.description:
The gas price willing to be paid by the sender in wei
Default: 0

maxPriorityFeePerGas.title: max priority fee per gas
maxPriorityFeePerGas.description:
Maximum fee per gas the sender is willing to pay to miners in wei
Default: 0

maxFeePerGas.title: max fee per gas
maxFeePerGas.description:
The maximum total fee per gas the sender is willing to pay (includes the network / base fee and miner / priority fee) in wei
Default: 0

maxFeePerBlobGas.title: max fee per blob gas
maxFeePerBlobGas.description:
The maximum total fee per blob gas the sender is willing to pay in wei
Default: 0

traceTransfers.title: Trace ETH Transfers
traceTransfers.description:
Adds ETH transfers as ERC20 transfer events to the logs. These transfers have emitter contract parameter set as address(0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee).
Default: false.

validation.title: Validation
validation.description:
When true, the eth_simulateV1 does all validations that a normal EVM would do, except contract sender and signature checks. When false, eth_simulateV1 behaves like eth_call.
Default: false.

returnFullTransactions.title: Return Full Transactions
returnFullTransactions.description: When true, the method returns full transaction objects, otherwise, just hashes are returned.

schema.title: Block number, tag, or block hash

anyOf.title: Block tag
anyOf.description: `earliest`: The lowest numbered block the client has available; `finalized`: The most recent crypto-economically secure block, cannot be re-orged outside of manual intervention driven by community coordination; `safe`: The most recent block that is safe from re-orgs under honest majority and certain synchronicity assumptions; `latest`: The most recent block in the canonical chain observed by the client, this block may be re-orged out of the canonical chain even under healthy/normal conditions; `pending`: A sample next block built by the client on top of `latest` and containing the set of transactions usually taken from local mempool. Before the merge transition is finalized, any call querying for `finalized` or `safe` block MUST be responded to with `-39001: Unknown block` error

items.title: Result of eth_simulate block-level, with array of calls

maxPriorityFeePerGas.title: max priority fee per gas
maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: Maximum fee per gas the sender is willing to pay to miners in wei

maxFeePerGas.title: max fee per gas
maxFeePerGas.description: The maximum total fee per gas the sender is willing to pay (includes the network / base fee and miner / priority fee) in wei

gasPrice.title: gas price
gasPrice.description: The effective gas price paid by the sender in wei. For transactions not yet included in a block, this value should be set equal to the max fee per gas. This field is DEPRECATED, please transition to using effectiveGasPrice in the receipt object going forward.

chainId.title: chainId
chainId.description: Chain ID that this transaction is valid on

authorizationList.title: authorizationList
authorizationList.description: List of authorizations for the transaction

chainId.title: chainId
chainId.description: Chain ID on which this transaction is valid

yParity.title: yParity
yParity.description: The parity (0 for even, 1 for odd) of the y-value of the secp256k1 signature

yParity.title: yParity
yParity.description: The parity (0 for even, 1 for odd) of the y-value of the secp256k1 signature.

v.title: v
v.description: For backwards compatibility, `v` is optionally provided as an alternative to `yParity`. This field is DEPRECATED and all use of it should migrate to `yParity`.

maxPriorityFeePerGas.description: Maximum fee per gas the sender is willing to pay to miners in wei

maxFeePerGas.description: The maximum total fee per gas the sender is willing to pay (includes the network / base fee and miner / priority fee) in wei

maxFeePerBlobGas.title: max fee per blob gas
maxFeePerBlobGas.description: The maximum total fee per gas the sender is willing to pay for blob gas in wei

gasPrice.description: The effective gas price paid by the sender in wei. For transactions not yet included in a block, this value should be set equal to the max fee per gas. This field is DEPRECATED, please transition to using effectiveGasPrice in the receipt object going forward.

blobVersionedHashes.title: blobVersionedHashes
blobVersionedHashes.description: List of versioned blob hashes associated with the transaction's EIP-4844 data blobs

oneOf.title: Result of call failure
oneOf.description: The error messages are suggestions, and clients might implement different error messages. However, the error codes are enforced by the spec.

errors.message: The Ethereum node encountered an internal error
Not enough gas provided to pay for intrinsic gas for a transaction
Insufficient funds to pay for gas fees and value for a transaction
Block gas limit exceeded by the block's transactions
Block number in sequence did not increase
Block timestamp in sequence did not increase or stay the same
Multiple MovePrecompileToAddress referencing the same address to replace
